data.assistant_message: Ok—behtar ine ham roshan begi chi mikhay, ham sade o rahat.
action_steps: Yek jomle roshan darbare niyat begu
Yek soaal-e baz bepors ta taraf rahat javab بده
Yek message-e short pishnahadi ro send kon
data.best_next_message: Man alan az ashnayi khosham miad, doost daram aheste aheste hamdiaro behtar beshnasim. To chi mikhay az in rabete?
